name: you-are-not
description: Write accurate code. Meet deadlines. Maintain type flexibility. No compiling. A minimal, blazing fast, intuitive, and customisable type-checking helper that you are missing.

scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.build: bili --format umd --module-name Not --input index.js --file-name not.js; bili --format umd --module-name Not --input index.js --file-name not.min.js --minify

author: calvintwr
